sentences.sContent: This process gives your vehicle the best chance of holding traction on the steep hill, because both the gearbox and the brakes are locking you in place.
sentences.sContent_eng: This process gives your vehicle the best chance of holding traction on the steep hill, because both the gearbox and the brakes are locking you in place.
sentences.sCn: 以上一系列操作会让你的车子尽可能在陡坡上保持住牵引力，因为此时变速箱和制动器都起到了锁定车辆的作用。

phrases.pCn: 牵引力控制系统；循迹控制系统
牵引电动机；牵引马达；电车用电动机

trans.tranOther: the process of treating a broken bone with special medical equipment that pulls it
